attributes.action: 30 hours free childcare for those parent in full time education
attributes.additional_details: I wouldn't be able to go back to work on the wages I would earn now and pay childcare so I'm trying to better that by studying , which if this issue was solved a lot more people would do the same I believe
attributes.background: I am an access to HE student going on to university next year to be a social worker I have a 1 year old and a 2 year old , I will get 15 hours free for my 2 year old then more when turn 3 same with my 1 when they turn 2, I'm panicking about childcare as its expensive but I need to better our future
